OOMI 智能家居总控制系统: OOMI Smart Home General Control System
OOMI使用自主创新的Tap-and-Touch专利技术，刷新智能家居安装新定义: OOMI has revolutionized smart home installation through its proprietary technology, Tap-and-Touch. With just a tap of its innovative controller, OOMI Touch, users can instantaneously connect any OOMI devices to their systems, achieving the OOMI system's full control of one's house. Smart home life starts with a touch.
OOMI场景模式能充分满足您在生活中的各类需求，借助OOMI一系列智能节点设备打: The OOMI scenario mode can fully meet all needs of OOMI users concerning their daily life. OOMI devices can be connected together to create adjustable, flexible smart home scenario modes that support multiple scene applications. Cooperation and interaction of OOMI devices can not only spare users from the burdensome traditional one-by-one controlment but also help them get rid of extra living expense. In addition, by using OOMI Touch, OOMI PRO APP or OOMI Mote, users can set different scene modes independently according to their very own preferences.
OOMI大宅系统涵盖健康、语音、安防、灯光、家电、娱乐、环境七大类产品，采用边缘: The OOMI Big House System covers seven categories of products, including health, voice, security, lighting, household appliances, entertainment and environment. Adopting edge computing, OOMI is able to operate independently without cloud services so that it can function even when the internet dosen't. Its stable operation will thoroughly remove the problem of the unstability of wireless products connection in villa, duplexes and platform. Supporting multiple gateway cooperation and device mesh communication, The OOMI Big House System fuses multiple networks into a seamless one. As both centralized and hierarchical control are achieveable, users can choose either way to manage their big house.
OOMI智慧小区管理系统，是利用物联网技术、无线控制技术、移动互联网技术，基于数: Making use of technolohies such as IoT, wireless control and mobile internet, OOMI Smart Community System is made to provide users with a safe, cozy, convenient living environment. Based on digital intercom system, smart home and IoT, OOMI controls lights, curtain, home appliances and entertainment devices, supporting environment monitoring, security managenment, guests visiting record and elevator calling, therefore creating a modern smart community features in smart, safe, comfort and high-efficiency.
OOMI智慧校园管理系统，是利用物联网技术、云计算、移动互联网技术，基于智能家居: By using the technologies of IoT, cloud computing and mobile Internet, OOMI Smart School System takes the ground of smart home and IoT to realize its general control in classrooms and dormistories covering lights, projection, curtain, air conditioners, as well as environment monitoring and security management. It supports remote control, custom scenario setting, time management and data jointing with other sub-systems, creating a real smart school that can provide school administrative department with effective data and offer teachers and students with easy, quick and nice smart teaching experience.
OOMI智能健康场景系统可以实时快速、高效监测家里空气中漂浮的PM2.5、CO、: The OOMI Smart Health Scenario system can monitor the concentration of harmful gases such as PM2.5, CO, VOC, formaldehyde and flammable gas floating in your home instantly and efficiently. It can automatically open the air cleaning and ventilation system once harmful gases are detected. Combined with OOMI Smart Home System, it can also manage to balance the temperature and humidity condition indoors, providing you with the most comfortable living environment, leading you to a environmental friendly and intelligent healhy life.
OOMI智能家居大宅系统为智慧别墅提供完美解决方案，既可以通过云平台远程管理，也: OOMI Big House System is special for smart mansion. By localization management or remote management through cloud platform, it remains the overall smart control of health, voice, security, lighting, appliances, entertainment and environment. Adopting the unique, powerful cascade system which allows multi-gateway cascade and cross-gateway scene interaction, the System is stable and reliable and completely solves the problem of wireless product application in villa. It can meet the needs of all family members as both centralized control and hierarchical control are applicable. In terms of function and performance, "people-oriented" concept has been throughout, enabling people to fully experience the comfort, security, informatization and other aspects brought by the smart home system to daily life.
OOMI智能家居系统支持家用电器远程无线智能操控，能让您轻松控制家里的电器，并监: OOMI Smart Home System allows remote and wireless control of house appliances, monitoring the latter's working state and consumption. It can also analyse the power consumption so as to optimize concumption structure, lowering your living cost and leading you to a more convenient and eco-friendly life.
OOMI智能家居节点设备支持定时开关的功能，您可以关闭没有必要长期待机的家电，智: The OOMI Smart Home devices possess timing function, allowing timed power on/off of your appliances, therefore making your life more energy-saving and eco-friendly.
OOMI酒店客房控制系统是利用计算机、通讯、物联网、无线控制等技术，基于客房内的: Based on wireless communication network built by the smart gateway in the hotel room, OOMI Smart Hotel System uses technologoes including computer, communication, IoT, wireless control, etc. to fulfill its mastery of the hotel, covering security, entrance guard, central air conditioning, lighting, environment monitoring systems and so on. It can reflect the state of guest room, guest demand, service conditions and device status, etc., assisting the hotel to allocate guest room resources monitoring and analysis. It aims to intelligentize hotel through smart devices, providing the hotel guests with wonderful living experience as well as creating value to the hotel.

丰唐公司是一家集设计研发、生产、销售于一体，专注于物联网产品及无线智能家居产品的: Fantem Technologies (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd is a joint venture founded in 2011 by American company Aeon Labs LLC and Chinese company YITOA. Focusing on IoT and smart home, Fantem does R&D, design, production and business development all by itself. With rich experience of wireless transmission and household appliances, Fantem has become a remarkable manufacturer in smart home field. It is committed to providing energy-saving, safe and easy-control products which improve the convenience and comfort of human life. High quality, convenience, easy use and outstanding appearance are all the attractive features. The products feature comprehensive coverage, can achieve lighting, curtain, air conditioning, audio-visual equipment and other appliances intelligent control, being not only applicable to families, but also for hotels, offices and so on.
丰唐智能家居系统包含有网关类、开关类、传感类、控制类、照明类、安防类等多种类型的: OOMI Smart Home system contains a variety of products including gateways, switches, sensors, controlers, lights, security devices and so on. It is super functional as it can achieve intelligent control of lighting, curtain, air conditioning, audio-visual equipment and other appliances.
丰唐物联凭借在智能家居行业多年的积淀，目前已成为国家物联网协会成员，国家高新技术: With years of accumulation in the smart home industry, Fantem has become a member of the National IoT Association and has been recognized as National High-Tech Enterprise and Guangdong Province Enterprise of Observing Contract and Valuing Credit. In addition, it also has successively obtained the IPMS certification, the 2017 Smart Home Overseas Market Development Award, Smart Home Pioneer Award and other important certificates and awards.
丰唐物联在美国加州硅谷拥有一支顶尖的研发团队，掌握了多项物联网前沿技术，目前已拥: Possessing an American Silicon Valley firm providing advanced technologies, with over 100 patents and an anual output of more than one million smart home product sets, Fantem has earned great reputation among its millions of users across the world for the products' state of art technology, super practical functions and even the fashionable outlook design. OOMI never limits itself to the field of smart home, it is applicable to many other fields including hotels and offices.
丰唐物联技术(深圳)有限公司是一家集设计研发、生产、销售于一体，专注于物联网产品: Fantem Technologies (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd is a joint venture founded in 2011 by American company Aeon Labs LLC and Chinese company YITOA. For over a decade Fantem has specialized in the research and development, production and sales of smart home products for the global market.
